summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Boylston Avenue North from East Newton Street to Roanoke Street et al in the City of Seattle, by paving with asphalt under Ordinance No. 20413, creating Local Improvement District No. 2008 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
